tidbits.title: Rich Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: Hungary boasts a rich cultural heritage with influences from Magyar traditions, historic architecture, and a vibrant folk music and dance scene.

tidbits.title: Thermal Baths
tidbits.description: The country is famous for its thermal baths, including the historic Széchenyi and Gellért Baths, offering relaxation and wellness experiences.

tidbits.title: Cuisine and Wine
tidbits.description: Hungarian cuisine, known for dishes like goulash and chimney cake, along with its excellent wines, is integral to the country's culinary identity.
